items.preText: NK: "BD fans ..calm down ...Bangladesh batting is capable of take down 220 target in 24 overs.."
items.text: full, on off, and driven to wide long off for a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: full, on middle, and skidding into his pads. Defended towards the leg side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: arm ball, full on middle, and flicked to midwicket. They scamper across for one
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: full, just outside leg, and the ball hits his thigh guard. Rolls away to short fine leg
items.postText: Pradeep: "A winner is one who braves all odds come what may, so all dear BD fans life is not fair but whoever swims across the tide is always remembered. Try hard in the conditions accorded to you and you will definitely see your team remembered. "
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 leg bye

items.preText: Badal Chandra M: "Is all the comments are read by cricinfo? or some of them are chosen arbitrarily? @suman made the same point as mine and his comment was published. ain't jealous but just curious." --- well, what do you think? :) Also, only a 10-minute break between innings
items.text: full toss, just outside off, and punched to wide mid-off for a single
items.postText: Suvo: "To the Bangladeshi fans: I guess this is a blessing in disguise. First time Bangladeshi batsmen are facing a real challenge to chase down a massive total, surely a much needed pre-wold cup practice."
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: full, on middle, but he's overstepped! Driven to long on. Massive no-ball
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, (no ball) 1 run

items.text: full, on off, and he slaps a drive to the fielder manning the long-off boundary. Nearly a yorker
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: another full toss angling away, and he mistimes a square drive to point. Misfield allows them to pinch a single. The fielder saves three runs though
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: yorker, on leg, and dug away to wide long on. They race across for one
items.postText: Vinod Rajpal: "@BD fans ; Deciding to field first was their call - so they would be prepared for the target !!"
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: slower ball, full outside off and angling further away. Ambris reaches out to drive, misses
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, no run

items.text: play and a miss again. Teasing offcutter angling away from Ambris. Tries to cut, but can't get bat on ball
items.postText: Neeraj: "I think WI will look to save wickets here, as it will boost the target after DLS comes into application." -- yep, looks like the plan
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, no run

items.text: full, just outside off, and slapped down to long off for a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: full, on leg, and driven back to Ambris. Well stopped by Mehidy diving to his right
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, no run

items.text: length ball on middle, and flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: loose shot! And taken by Mosaddek at long on. Tries to slog this over midwicket, but Mosaddek gets under it, takes a catch, throws it in the air because he was going over the boundary, and finally recovers to complete the catch
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, OUT

dismissal.text: SD Hope c Mosaddek Hossain b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 74 (64b 6x4 3x6) SR: 115.62

items.text: full on leg, and he inside-edges a shot onto his pads. Tidy
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, no run

items.text: terrific over! full, on middle, and all Ambris can do is work it towards midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, no run

items.preText: One over to go. Can West Indies breach 150? Remember, Bangladesh will have to chase way more than 150 courtesy DLS.
items.text: back of a length, wide outside off, and he drags a pull along the ground to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length, wide outside off, and left alone. Umpire reckons it's a legal ball.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, no run

items.text: back of a length, just outside off, and pulled to the sweeper-fielder on the leg side one more time
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, 1 run

items.preText: Ik: "When the going gets tough, the toughs get going."
items.text: angling away, length ball, and he slaps a cut shot behind point. Sweeper fielder can't cut it off. WI go past 150
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, FOUR runs

items.text: yorker, on off, and dug back to Mustafizur
items.postText: rahat: "I'm going to sleep. There's nothing left for BD in this match. But I'm really proud how they performed in the series. Congrats to WI for winning the trophy " -- stay! They may just surprise you
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, no run

items.text: full and wide outside off. Guided to deep point. West Indies finish on 152 for 1
items.postText: 5.45pm So, that's the end of West Indies' innings. A terrific first-wicket stand - which happened more than three hours ago - ensures Bangladesh need 210 to win in 24 overs. Hope and Ambris finish their tournament on a bright note. Can their bowlers now deliver? We'll be back in 10 minutes to learn more.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, 1 run
